project_descr:
- Set up a national sub-committee on stigma & discrimination (SD)
- Improve skills of educators to provide SD prevention education
- Human resources & services in place in AIDS right protection centers

outputs.output_descr:
The three outputs under the Programme entitled " Stigma and Discrimination Prevention and AIDS Rights Protection" are as follows:
Output 1 - National and sub-national mechnsims on stigma-discrimnation prevention and AIDS rights protection officially established and well functioning;
Output 2 - Key stakeholders in government sector, private business partners and Civil Society Organizations mobilized and supporting stigma and discrimination prevention education services in 3 pilot provinces;and
Output 3 - Improved legal hotline service/AIDS rights protection centres and call volume increased in pilot and neighbouring provinces.
